Medical Centers

End to end efficient management for Medical Centers, with 100% Cloud solutions to perform all stages of Diagnostic Imaging, from scheduling patients, through the center's financial and strategic management, automatic image storage, in addition to creating and distribution of reports and exams.

I WANT TO TALK TO A CONSULTANT

CfazPlus

End-to-end management, from scheduling to exam delivery for dentists and patients.

CfazMax

Management, storage, realization and delivery of Dental Radiology reports and exams.

CfazManager

Financial and strategic management for franchises, networks and clinics of Dental Radiology.

CfazBusiness

Exclusive marketplace for outsourcing reports, connecting Radiologists to Dental Radiology clinics.

Bring digital transformation to your business

CFAZ.NET WAS BORN AS THE 1st 100% ONLINE SYSTEM FOR RADIOLOGY

The experience is simplified from the beginning, ensuring more agility and efficiency for the performance of exams and for the management of the clinic or medical center.

PACS ONLINE

DICOM integration with all devices on the market and 100% secure storage in the Cloud, thanks to the infrastructure provided by Google Cloud Platform.

RIS ONLINE

Schedules, PEP (Electronic Patient Record), Integration with any equipment that uses the DICOM protocol (PACS / Worklist), Financial Management, Control of Agreements and Disallowances, everything can be accessed from anywhere by the administrators of the clinic.

MAXIMUM IMAGE QUALITY

We are the only management system for Radiology that offers storage of images and exams with 100% original quality.

DICOM

Soporte nativo para Worklist y PACS, lo que permite la integración con cualquier dispositivo. Además, la impresora DICOM gratuita permite la integración con todo tipo de impresoras DRY.

STL

Full support for digital models: storage, visualization and distribution.

TOMOGRAPHY

Storage and distribution of CT scans 100% online. With Cfaz.net, the applicant can view the tomographies directly on the online platform, without the need to install any software or download the file on the machine itself.

We help you increase your productivity , reduce costs and improve your results

UNIFIED MANAGEMENT OF DENTAL OR MEDICAL NETWORKS

Manage the entire network of clinics or medical centers in a single system, viewing indicators for the entire network or each center separately.

FREE AND AUTOMATIC UPDATES

Always be ahead of your competitors with an updated system to your measure. All updates are automatic for all customers, that is, they do not need to be installed or purchased separately.

REAL-TIME DELIVERY

Automatically store the images and deliver them to applicants in real time, right after the image is acquired, with just one click.

EXCELLENCE IN SERVICE

A qualified and multidisciplinary team performs our service in a humanized way, in real time, via Whatsapp, phone, e-mail or even Direct Chat in the system.

I WANT TO TALK TO A CONSULTANT

The future is digital and it is now. We take advances in cloud technology
into your daily life with a friendly, intuitive and up-to-date system.

Artificial Intelligence and Technologies developed by our engineers

Cfaz's Artificial Intelligence is present in our Cephalometric Tracing tool - for Dental Radiology - and in Automatic Image Identification for assembling templates. The Radiologist reduces the time it takes to perform a tracing, saves resources and can focus on what really matters: the patient's health and the development of his business.

I WANT TO TALK TO A CONSULTANT

AppCfaz

Free image and exam portal for your applicants and patients, available in a Mobile Web Application, with complete patient history and online access via smartphone, tablet, in addition to the computer.

I WANT TO TALK TO A CONSULTANT

Tomography

Storage and distribution of CT scans 100% online. With Cfaz.net, the applicant can view the tomographies directly on the online platform, without the need to install any software or download the file on the machine itself.

The DicomViewer developed by our engineering team allows to visualize the volumetric reconstruction MPR (Multiplanar Reconstruction) of the tomography. It also offers tools for volume manipulation, allowing you to change the axes of visualization of the cuts, in addition to applying filters and performing measurements.

Talk to one of our consultants

Find out what advantages Cfaz.net offers over other systems in terms of saving time, reducing costs and increasing productivity and billing.

DATA SECURITY

Our customers benefit from the security and robustness of the same cloud infrastructure used by Google in services such as its search engine, Gmail and Youtube.

STORAGE FOR 20 YEARS

Meeting the standards of all health councils: CFO, CFM and ANVISA.

*Válido durante a vigência do contrato

ADEQUACY to LGPD

We adopt the most advanced security protocols to guarantee the integrity and inviolability of patient data, in addition to committing ourselves not to use or share data without your consent.
